General.Name: Guangdong Nedfon Air System Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Guangdong Nedfon Air System Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells ventilation products. The company products include air curtain, household exhaust fan, industry ventilation fan, duct fan, energy recovery ventilator, external rotor motor, and other firefighting ventilators. Guangdong Nedfon Air System Co., Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Taishan, China. Guangdong Nedfon Air System Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Taishan Aoda Investment Co., Ltd.
